doc:
Carlos Villarías https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carlos_Villar%C3%ADas 0 Carlos Villarías (7 July 1892 – 27 April 1976) was a Spanish actor who was born in Córdoba, Spain and died in California, USA. His most famous role is in the title role of the Spanish language version of Drácula (1931), with Barry Norton and Lupita Tovar filmed at night on the same sets as the English language version starring Bela Lugosi. Carlos_Villarías ( 7_July_1892 – 27_April_1976 ) was a_Spanish_actor who was_born in Córdoba , Spain and died in California , USA . His_most_famous_role is in the_title_role of the_Spanish_language_version of Drácula_(_1931_) , with Barry_Norton and Lupita_Tovar filmed at night on the_same_sets as the_English_language_version starring Bela_Lugosi .
